ClassDesc: An implementation of @B_android#util#Property_E@ to be used specifically with fields of type int. This type-specific subclass enables performance benefit by allowing calls to a @B_android#util#IntProperty#setValue_E@ function that takes the primitive int type and avoids autoboxing and other overhead associated with the Integer class.
